channel.title: ArcGIS on Alexandre Neto
channel.description: Recent content in ArcGIS on Alexandre Neto

item.title: QGIS Features I long for while using ArcGIS
item.description: (aka Features that ArcGIS Desktop users might not know that exists) EN | PT From time to time, I read articles comparing ArcGIS vs QGIS. Since many of those articles are created from an ArcGIS user point of view, they invariably lead to biased observations on QGIS lack of features. It’s time for a QGIS user perspective, so bare with me on this (a bit) long, totally and openly biased post.
